validaAdvpl.queryNoEmbedded:
Use of Query IMPROPER without Embedded SQL.! 
 Use: BeginSQL ... EndSQL.

validaAdvpl.folMes: This parameter has been deprecated in the Protheus 12!
validaAdvpl.conflictMerge: There are merge conflicts, evaluate before continuing!
validaAdvpl.selectAll:
Use not allowed use of SELECT with asterisk 
 '*'.!
validaAdvpl.crlf: It is recommended to use the expression CRLF.
validaAdvpl.noSchema: Use not allowed use of SHEMA
validaAdvpl.conout:
Use not allowed of Conout.
Using the Default Log API (FWLogMsg).
